content: k10 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more 28 sts round 22 *k1 ssk k8 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more 24 sts round 23 *k1 ssk k6 k2tog k1 repeat from * once more 20 sts kitchener stitch the remaining 20 sts together 10 sts for front and 10 sts for back thumb place the 19 sts from waste yarn on needles pu 5 sts from hand pm for bor 24 sts round 24 k around 24 sts round 25 k18 k2tog k2 ssk 22 sts round 26 k around 22 sts round 27 k17 k2tog k1 ssk 20 sts round 28 k around 20 sts repeat round 28 8 more times so knit round 28 a total of 9 times 20 sts round 29 *k2tog k2 repeat 4 more times 15 sts round 30 k around 15 sts round 31 *k2tog k1 repeat 4 more times 10 sts round 32 k around 10 sts round 33 k2tog 5 times 5 sts break yarn and pull through sts on the needle
